reviewText: I was so saddened to hear of this iconic  comdeian's passing. Sid  Caesar was one of a kind, the likes of whom we will never see again. I wanted to see how many of these collectible tapes Amazon had, if at all,and count myself lucky to own one from years back. The tape is fun, entertaining, as only Sid Caesar would have it, and the exercises he demonstrates (I am using present tense)can be done anywhere because he sets up a portable chinning machine, and uses chairs and furniture as exercise equipment. He also shows how you can do simple,yet effective exercises on a mat on the floor. These exercises and a clean life style helped prolong Mr. Caesar's life to a ripe old age of ninety-one. He will surely be missed.
